Author: Aygurlitsyaalt
Text: I'm in a similar boat and it just irked me how much easier it was to just...not eat.  But it has gotten a little easier the longer I do it. It's like all that noise in my brain is quieting down and I can focus better.  You'll get there! Just keep reminding yourself the reasons you are doing this. Literally write down any positive aspects as they come up. It helps.  ðŸ’šâœŒ
